# Pagos API - Complete Overview

**Organization & Asset Management API for Lyzr**

**Base URL**: `https://pagos-prod.studio.lyzr.ai`

**Total Endpoints**: 93

---

## API Categories

### [AEP](./docs/aep.md) (6 endpoints)

AEP (Access Entry Point) policies

---

### [APPS](./docs/apps.md) (5 endpoints)

Application management

---

### [BLUEPRINTS](./docs/blueprints.md) (12 endpoints)

Template management with sharing, cloning, and public browse

---

### [GROUPS](./docs/groups.md) (13 endpoints)

Asset grouping with members, roles, tags, and metadata

---

### [KEYS](./docs/keys.md) (6 endpoints)

API key management and usage tracking

---

### [ORGANIZATIONS](./docs/organizations.md) (18 endpoints)

Manage organizations, sub-organizations, members, and domains

---

### [OTHER](./docs/other.md) (1 endpoints)

---

### [POLICIES](./docs/policies.md) (10 endpoints)

Permission policies and resource sharing

---

### [USAGES](./docs/usages.md) (8 endpoints)

Usage tracking, billing, and quota management

---

### [USER](./docs/user.md) (3 endpoints)

User onboarding, consent, and questionnaires

---

### [VIEWS](./docs/views.md) (10 endpoints)

Asset views and group management

---

### [WEBHOOKS](./docs/webhooks.md) (1 endpoints)

Webhook configuration

---
